channel.title: Ok...i really need help
channel.description:
Ok i used every one advise for finding the Shops....but i put the npc id into my search and only found it in Client..no x-y cords there.. Commands Probaly not there either... and items....none of this was in shops?
UGHh im such a frakin nub... (sad Face)
Edit.... I found the shop i think i want? dont know for sure because it only has the option to talk to him...not trade...could some one help this noob...

item.title: Ok...i really need help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I’m not really sure what you’re asking…

If you need to find the NPC spawn, autospawn.cfg

Otherwise the name and items in the shop will be located in shops.cfg on most sources (317).

Read full topic
